text: Rototuna is a suburb of Hamilton. It is situated east of Flagstaff and the Waikato River. It is one of the fastest growing suburbs of Hamilton since the late 1990s. It has three shopping centres and has two primary schools, two high schools and a Christian school located in the suburb. It was once a small village until the late 1990s when rapid growth started pouring into the suburb. == References == Category:Hamilton, New Zealand
title: Rototuna
